item.title: Puthole/Manhole at Kensington Church street, 24th November
item.description:
There is a deep manhole at Kensington Church street (at the level of Bedford Gardens). It’s roughly in the middle of the left side of the road, and it is not easily visible, which makes it particularly hazardous for cyclists, who risk serious injury if they ride over it. The depth and low visibility of the manhole increase the danger, especially under normal traffic conditions or poor lighting. Quick repair is needed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Kensington Church Street, Kensington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole in road, 24th November
item.description:
There is a deep pothole at Knightsbridge in front of the busstop 'Knightsbridge Barracks', stop KF. It could be very hazardous for cyclists or motor/scooter drivers, who risk serious injury if they ride over it. The depth and low visibility of the pothole increases the danger, especially under normal traffic conditions or poor lighting. Urgent action is required

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 245, Knightsbridge, Knightsbridge, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge and mattresses abandoned in the entrance of St Vincent House, 24th November
item.description:
Fridge and mattresses abandoned in the entrance of St Vincent House. They have been there for 3 week and no action has been taken. It has been brought to my attention that tickets are closed and marked as fixed with being resolved, please action this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fendall Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Community hall bin not emptied for 3 weeks, 24th November
item.description:
The Coldharbour Community Hall bin hasn't been collected for 3 weeks. This is not the first time, I have had to run across the road to tell them. They tell me it gets collected every week which is not true and I hate council staff lie to me when they keep driving past when I'm there. Please can you get your staff to collect every week after they do the Nisa store across the road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): William Barefoot Drive, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loading Parking Bay, 24th November
item.description:
I’m work at the Co Op, we have a parking bay in front that we are constantly having to wait to use because we have vehicles constantly unlawfully parked there. Which has lead to us having to cancel deliveries.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Denmark Hill, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
